pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 8, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

7:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 53rd National Prayer Breakfast and read a passage.

Canada Hall 3
3rd Floor
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12 p.m.

Toronto, Ontario

3:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a demonstration of Shopify technology.

Evergreen Brick Works
550 Bayview Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to register with sheryl.so@shopify.com by 12 p.m. and arrive no later than 3 p.m. at the Young Welcome Centre and report to media registration.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with the founder and CEO of Shopify, Tobias LÃ¼tke.

Evergreen Brick Works
550 Bayview Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to register with sheryl.so@shopify.com by 12 p.m. and arrive no later than 3 p.m. at the Young Welcome Centre and report to media registration.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the March of the Living 30th Anniversary Gala.

Shaarei Shomayim
470 Glencairn Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage of remarks
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:20 p.m. at the west entrance and report to Social Hall A.
